fields.value: ACCRA Cost of Living Index - Historical Dataset (1Q1990-2009)

authorName.value: American Chamber of Commerce Reseachers Association; Council for Community and Economic Research

dsDescriptionValue.value: The ACCRA Cost of Living Index (COLI) is a measure of living cost differences among urban areas compiled by the Council for Community and Economic Research.  Conducted quarterly, the index compares the price of goods and services among approximately 300 communities in the United States and Canada.  This Microsoft Excel file contains the average prices of goods and services published in the ACCRA Cost of Living Index since 1990.

keywordValue.value: Consumer prices indexes; prices; cost and standard of living

producerName.value: Council for Community and Economic Research

distributorName.value: Council for Community and Economic Research;  Arlington, VA
